template_input_params.name: ibm_stack_id
template_input_params.description: A unique stack identifier.
template_input_params.label: Stack Identifier

template_input_params.name: ibm_stack_name
template_input_params.description: A unique stack name.
template_input_params.label: Stack Name

template_input_params.name: allow_unverified_ssl
template_input_params.description: Communication with the vSphere server through a self-signed certificate
template_input_params.label: vSphere server communication through self-signed certificate

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_dns_servers
template_input_params.description: Domain name servers for the virtual network adapter
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_dns_suffixes
template_input_params.description: Name resolution suffixes for the virtual network adapter
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffixes - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_keep_on_remove
template_input_params.description: Deletes the template disk when the virtual machine is deleted.
template_input_params.label: Delete template disk on virtual machine deletion - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_domain
template_input_params.description: Domain name of the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Domain Name - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_access_token
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Access Token

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_service
template_input_params.description: IBM Pattern Manager Service
template_input_params.label: IBM Pattern Manager Service

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo
template_input_params.description: URL to the IBM Installation Manager repository (https://<hostname/IP>:<port>/IMRepo)
template_input_params.label: IBM Installation Manager Repository

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo_password
template_input_params.description: Password to the IBM Installation Manager repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Installation Manager Repository Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_im_repo_user
template_input_params.description: User name to access the IBM Installation Manager repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Installation Manager Repository Username

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_password
template_input_params.description: Password to the IBM software repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repository Password

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo
template_input_params.description: Root level of the IBM software repository (https://<hostname>:<port>)
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repository Root

template_input_params.name: ibm_sw_repo_user
template_input_params.description: User name to access the IBM software repository
template_input_params.label: IBM Software Repository Username

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-image
template_input_params.description: Identifier of the operating system image or template that you use to create the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the administrator account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-os_password
template_input_params.description: Password to the operating system to access the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Operating System Password - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: The private, base64-encoded CAMC SSH key that is used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Private CAMC SSH key for connection to the virtual guest

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Public CAMC SSH key value that is used to connect to a guest. Used on VMware only.
template_input_params.label: Public CAMC SSH key value for connection to a guest on VMware

template_input_params.name: user_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: User-defined public SSH key used to connect to the virtual machine. This key must be in openSSH format.
template_input_params.label: User Public SSH Key - ssh_keys

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_thin_provisioned
template_input_params.description: The template disk volume is thin_provisioned.
template_input_params.label: Disk, thin_provisioned - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_size
template_input_params.description: Size of template disk volume. This size should be equal to the template disk size.
template_input_params.label: Root Disk Size - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Short hostname - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_root_disk_datastore
template_input_params.description: Name of the data storage cluster on the VM target disk.
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Datastore - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 gateway for the vNIC configuration.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Gateway Address - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ipv4_address
template_input_params.description: IPv4 address for the vNIC configuration.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine IP Address - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_memory
template_input_params.description: The amount of memory allocated to the virtual machine, in megabytes.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Memory - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.description: IPv4 prefix length for the vNIC configuration. This length must be expressed as a number between 8 and 32.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Netmask Prefix - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_number_of_vcpu
template_input_params.description: The number of virtual CPUs for the virtual machine. This number must be a positive integer.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_network_interface_label
template_input_params.description: vSphere port group or network label for the virtual machine's vNIC
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vSphere Port Group - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_profiles_standalone_profiles_standalone1_keystorepassword
template_input_params.description: Specifies the password to use on all keystore files that are created during profile creation.
template_input_params.label: WebSphere default keystore password - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_os_user_name
template_input_params.description: The user identifier to the operating system which will be used to install the product. The identifier is created if it does not exist.
template_input_params.label: Workflow Installation User Identifier - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_os_user_shell
template_input_params.description: Shell that the operating system user uses for product installation
template_input_params.label: Shell for the operating system user

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_os_user_home
template_input_params.description: Location of the home directory that the operating system user uses for product installation
template_input_params.label: Workflow Installation Home Directory - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_install_dir
template_input_params.description: The installation root directory for IBM Business Automation Workflow product binaries
template_input_params.label: Workflow Product Installation Directory - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_install_mode
template_input_params.description: The installation mode for IBM Business Automation Workflow
template_input_params.label: IBM Business Automation Workflow Installation Mode

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_profile_dir
template_input_params.description: The directory path that contains WebSphere Application Server profiles
template_input_params.label: Workflow profile location - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_os_user_ldap_user
template_input_params.description: A flag that indicates whether to create the WebSphere user locally or to use an LDAP-based user
template_input_params.label: WebSphere to use LDAP for authentication - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_os_user_comment
template_input_params.description: Comments that you can add when you create the user identifier
template_input_params.label: Workflow comment - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_os_user_gid
template_input_params.description: The operating system group name that will be assigned to the product installation
template_input_params.label: Workflow user group name - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_product_version
template_input_params.description: The product version of IBM Business Automation Workflow
template_input_params.label: Workflow product version

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_product_edition
template_input_params.description: The product edition of IBM Business Automation Workflow: Server, ESB, or Express
template_input_params.label: Workflow product edition

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_features
template_input_params.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow features: WorkflowEnterprise.Production, WorkflowEnterprise.NonProduction, EnterpriseServiceBus.Production, EnterpriseServiceBus.NonProduction, WorkflowExpress.Production or WorkflowExpress.NonProduction
template_input_params.label: Workflow product features

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_offering_id
template_input_params.description: The offering ID of WebSphere Application Server
template_input_params.label: WAS offering ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_was_profile_id
template_input_params.description: The profile identifier of WebSphere Application Server
template_input_params.default: IBM WebSphere Application Server Network Deployment V8.5
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server profile ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_bpm_offering_id
template_input_params.description: The offering ID of IBM Business Automation Workflow
template_input_params.label: Workflow offering ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_offering_id
template_input_params.description: The offering ID of the DB2 database system
template_input_params.label: DB2 offering ID

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_cell_admin_username
template_input_params.description: The cell administrator's name
template_input_params.label: Cell Administrator Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_cell_admin_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The cell administrator's password
template_input_params.label: Cell Administrator Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_de_admin_username
template_input_params.description: The user name of the development environment administrator
template_input_params.label: Development Environment Administrator User Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_de_admin_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The password of the development environment administrator
template_input_params.label: Development Environment Administrator Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_config_product_type
template_input_params.description: The product type for configuration: Advanced, AdvancedOnly, Express, or Standard
template_input_params.label: Configuration Product Type

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_config_deployment_type
template_input_params.description: The deployment type for configuration: Workflow Center or Workflow Server
template_input_params.label: Configuration Deployment Type

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_config_cluster_type
template_input_params.description: The cluster type for the configuration: SingleCluster
template_input_params.label: Configuration Cluster Type

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_install
template_input_params.description: Installs the DB2 database system
template_input_params.label: DB2 Installation

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_port
template_input_params.description: The port of DB2 instance
template_input_params.label: DB2 instance port

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_instance_username
template_input_params.description: The instance user name of the DB2
template_input_params.label: DB2 Instance User Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_instance_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The password to the DB2 instance
template_input_params.label: DB2 Instance Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_fence_newuser
template_input_params.description: Creates a fence user
template_input_params.label: Create New DB2 Fence User

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_fence_username
template_input_params.description: The fence user name of the DB2 instance
template_input_params.label: DB2 Fence User Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_fence_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The fence password to the DB2 instance
template_input_params.label: DB2 Fence Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_das_newuser
template_input_params.description: Creates a user of the administration server
template_input_params.label: Create DB2 Administration Server User

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_das_username
template_input_params.description: The user name to access the administration server of the DB2 instance
template_input_params.label: DB2 Administration Server User Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_das_userpassword
template_input_params.description: The password to the administration server of the DB2
template_input_params.label: DB2 Administration Password

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_common_database
template_input_params.description: Specifies the name of the Common database
template_input_params.label: Common Database Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_process_database
template_input_params.description: Specifies the name of the Process database
template_input_params.label: Process Database Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_perf_database
template_input_params.description: Specifies the name of the Performance Data Warehouse database
template_input_params.label: Performance Data Warehouse Database Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_db2_cpe_database
template_input_params.description: Specifies the name of the Content database
template_input_params.label: Content Database Name

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_environment_purpose
template_input_params.description: Specifies the Workflow Server environment: Development, Test, Staging, or Production
template_input_params.label: Workflow Server Environment

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_offline
template_input_params.description: Specifies whether Workflow Server is offline or online
template_input_params.label: Workflow Server offline

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_pc_transport_protocol
template_input_params.description: Specifies the transport protocol through which Workflow Server connects to Workflow Center
template_input_params.label: Workflow Server to Workflow Center Transport Protocol

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_pc_hostname
template_input_params.description: Specifies the Workflow Center hostname which Workflow Server connects to
template_input_params.label: Workflow Center Hostname for Workflow Server Connection

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_pc_port
template_input_params.description: Specifies the Workflow Center port which Workflow Server connects to

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_pc_contextroot_prefix
template_input_params.description: Specifies the Workflow Center context root prefix which Workflow Server connects to
template_input_params.label: Workflow Center Context Root Prefix for Workflow Server Connection

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_pc_alias_user
template_input_params.description: Specifies the Workflow Center alias user which Workflow Server connects to
template_input_params.label: Workflow Center Alias User for Workflow Server Connection

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ps_pc_alias_password
template_input_params.description: Specifies the alias user password of Workflow Center that Workflow Server connects to
template_input_params.label: Workflow Center Alias User Password for Workflow Server Connection

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_ifix_names
template_input_params.description: Indicates the full names of ifix installation packages - e.g 8.6.10018001-WS-BPMPCPD-TFPD12345.zip
template_input_params.label: Ifix installation package - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_cluster
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere cluster to host the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Cluster - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_datacenter
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere datacenter for virtual machine creation
template_input_params.label: vSphere Datacenter - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_folder
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere folder for the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Folder Name - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Network adapter type for the vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: vSphere Network Adapter Type - Workflow01

template_input_params.name: Workflow01_resource_pool
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere resource pool to host the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Resource Pool - Workflow01
